page.title: 17RECREATION(2)-GALSTON
page.content: There are also many facilities in Galston for children as well as adults, such as, riding a BMX bike on the track at the back of the Industrial State.There are also Youth Clubs,at the St.Sophias church and the Parish church,as well as groups such as the Boys' Brigade and Scouts,where pool,darts,badminton,and table tennis are played.Sport plays a large part in the life of the community.Galston has 2 bowling greens,a tennis court,golf club and the Loudoun Sports Centre, which provides facilities for football ,running,target golf,pigeon shooting and hockey. Galston has 3 football teams;Boys under 15;Amateur Team;Galston United. Galston also provides facilities for women,such as Young Mothers' Group; Entertainments Group;Womens Guild.
